name: Special Characters Bundle
tagline: Easily insert special characters in TextMate
body:
This [TextMate][] bundle helps you to easily insert special characters into your document. For this purpose the bundle contains a set of snippets and a command called “Convert Single Character”.

[TextMate]: http://github.com/textmate/textmate

The following video shows “Convert Single Character” in action. The command replaces the character before the caret with a configurable special character after you hit the key combination `^` + `~`. For more information about the command, please take a look at the [bundle documentation](https://github.com/sanssecours/Special-Characters.tmbundle/blob/master/Support/Help/Help.md).

![Insert various special characters via “Convert Single Character”](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/sanssecours/Special-Characters.tmbundle/master/Support/Help/Images/Convert%20Single%20Character.gif)
